guifollowers-fabric.duskconfig.title: GUI Followers Config
guifollowers-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_foll: The header text above the follower list.
guifollowers-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_show: If enabled, shows the follower's health in the GUI list.
guifollowers-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_foll: The format of the health string in the GUI. <health> will be replaced by the percentage of total health.
guifollowers-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_show: If enabled, shows the follower's distance in blocks to the player in the GUI list.
guifollowers-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_foll: The format of the distance string in the GUI. <distance> will be replaced by distance in blocks.
guifollowers-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_dist: The distance in blocks around the player where the mod checks for tamed, non-sitting followers to add to the list. A value of -1 disables this feature.
guifollowers-fabric.duskconfig.distanceT: Distance To Check For Followers Around
guifollowers-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_time: The time in seconds in between checking for tamed, non-sitting followers around the player.
guifollowers-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_foll: Places the follower list on the left.
Places the follower list in the middle.
Places the follower list on the right.
The vertical offset (y coord) for the follower list. This determines how far down the list should be on the screen. Can be changed to prevent GUIs from overlapping.
guifollowers-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_RGB_: The red RGB value for the clock text.
The green RGB value for the clock text.
The blue RGB value for the clock text.
